resources.string: We are a group of people with a clear sense of purpose. We believe in continuous learning and development. The Technology awareness is main goal for our community.
There are no upcoming events. \n Stay tuned for next updates!!

Google Developer Student Clubs is a community which aims at helping students to network globally to facilitate the enhancement of their skills, resources and provides a platform to showcase their talent.

Google Developer Student Clubs Helping students bridge the gap between theory and practice Google Developer Student Clubs (GDSC) are community groups for college and university students interested in Google developer technologies. Students from all undergraduate or graduate programs with an interest in growing as a developer are welcome. By joining a GDSC, students grow their knowledge in a peer-to-peer learning environment and build solutions for local businesses and their community.
